dc:title: Fall Appeal - November 1953
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Says they are servants of those who send help for the work of hospitality. Notes their continuance is a miracle and that their purpose is to show the providence of God.
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 658 1953-11-02 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
